description.value:
The handle of this wand is a 5-inch-long piece of rosewood, but most of its length is a pair of twisted spider legs covered in gossamer webbing.

Activate Cast a spell

Frequency Once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Web] at 4th rank, but the strands of webbing are envenomed. Any creature that fails their Athletics check or Reflex save to navigate the web takes @Damage[2d6[poison],1d6[persistent,poison]]{2d6 poison damage plus 1d6 persistent poison damage}.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of web at 4th-rank.
